Summary: At 1:55AM in Simi Valey Ca,saw large yellowish glowing orb,observed for two minutes until it dissapeared
divs: Sighting Details)Ten minutes ago at 1:55AM May 19thI walked outside to smoke a cigerette and thought I saw the moon between some trees across the street. I got on my yard chair to get a better look because it was a yellowish color and I thought it was strange the moon was that color. It wa large(big eneogh for me to think it was the moon),glowing orange-yellow,and after two minutes it slowly dissapeared in on itself.Dont know if its related buy Alot of dogs were and still are barking.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Simi Valley
There were no other sightings in Simi Valley on or around May 19th 2013
